_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Identifying with the senses and their ob: Let them not identify with the eye
Let them not identify in the eye
Let them not identify from the eye
Let them not identify with sights
Let them not identify with eye consciousness
Let them not identify with eye contact
Let them not identify with the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact
Let them not identify in that
Let them not identify from that
Let them not identify: ‘That is mine.’
Let them not identify with the ear
Let them not identify with the nose
Let them not identify with the tongue
Let them not identify with the body
Let them not identify with the mind
Let them not identify with mind consciousness
Let them not identify with mind contact
Let them not identify with the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact
Let them not identify in that
Let them not identify as that
Let them not identify: ‘That is mine.’
